mapper.select: select nn.requrit_no as requritNO, nn.requrit_title as requritTitle, nn.requrit_start as requritStart, nn.requrit_end as requritEnd, nn.requrit_career as requritCareer, nn.requrit_gender as requritGender, nn.requrit_field as requritField, nn.requrit_detail as requritDetail, nn.employee_type as employeeType, nn.requrit_cancel as requritCancel from (select rownum as rnum, n.* from ( select * from teacher_requrit order by requrit_no desc)n)nn where rnum BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

select requrit_no as requritNO, requrit_title as requritTitle, requrit_start as requritStart, requrit_end as requritEnd, requrit_career as requritCareer, requrit_gender as requritGender, requrit_field as requritField, requrit_detail as requritDetail, employee_type as employeeType, requrit_cancel as requritCancel from teacher_requrit where requrit_no=#{requritNo}
